Vita sana & longa the preservation of health and prolongation of life proposed and proved : in the due observance of remarkable præcautions, and daily practicable rules, relating to body and mind, compendiously abstracted from the institutions and law of nature / by E. Maynwaringe ... Maynwaringe, Everard, 1628-1699? White, Robert, 1645-1703.
[8], 160 p., [1] leaf of plates : port.
Printed by J.D. Sold by the Booksellers, London : 1669.
Includes frontispiece portrait of the author, signed: R. White, sculp. Errata: p. [8]. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
